Text: doesn't work on iOs(4.2.1) at least not to copy it from iTunes to the phone, do i need to jailbreak the phone first?

@Spaaken 

 Requirements : Jailbroken iPhone or iPod Touch

just to complete alexishebest's hint:

jailbroben 4.2.1 is not enough. you must inslall "AppSync" from Cydia first, and then you will be able to sync apps downloaded outside app store.
